Name: Extra Case: My Girlfriend's Secrets
About the game: Your girlfriend seems to be hiding something. Will you respect her privacy or pry into her secrets? Don't worry, though. This is a horror dating sim with a time loop, so you can try again...and again...and again... Characters Sarah 'Sally' Sweet Your girlfriend who you recently got into a relationship with. She seems to be hiding something. 'Don't ever, EVER — open the door to my room.' 'Good boys get 'rewarded' at night.' You / Marty A male college student. You're dating your first ever girlfriend. 'If she doesn't want to talk about it, I'm not going to ask. She's entitled to her privacy, after all.' Features 'I told you not to open the door to my room!' You're invited to your girlfriend's house, but you see something you shouldn't see in her room, and then get attacked by someone... Rewind time to avoid tragedy After waking up, you somehow get the ability to rewind time. Using it is the only way to avoid tragedy. Investigate items to unlock options At the beginning, the choices you can make are limited. But by investigating items and advancing the plot, you can unlock options. Piece together the truth with ten endings This game has ten endings, each revealing one of your girlfriend's secrets. The only way to piece together the truth she hides is to connect those secrets.
Developers: Sounding Stone / 老奉毊,MaouCat Studio / 魔王貓工作室
